paragraphs.title: CSV, JSON and XML from URL
paragraphs.text:
import pandas as pd

url = "http://de.emoryce.com/getEmployee.php?return=csv"
df = pd.read_csv(url)
print("{0}\n{1}\n".format("*** CSV ***",dfcsv))

url = "http://de.emoryce.com/getEmployee.php?return=json"
dfjson = pd.read_json(url)
print("{0}\n{1}\n".format("*** JSON ***",dfjson))

import requests
import xml.etree.cElementTree as et
user_agent_url = 'http://de.emoryce.com/getEmployee.php?return=xml'
xml_data = requests.get(user_agent_url).content
dfxmlfile = pd.DataFrame(columns=('Name','Bday'))
root = et.fromstring(xml_data)
for node in root:
    name = node.find('Name').text
    bday = node.find('Bday').text
    dfxmlfile = dfxmlfile.append({'Name' : name , 'Bday' : bday},ignore_index=True)
print("{0}\n{1}\n".format("*** XML ***",dfxmlfile))

paragraphs.title: CSV, JSON and XML from file
paragraphs.text:
import pandas as pd

d = "/var/www/html/data/employee.csv"
dfcsvfile = pd.read_csv(d)
print("{0}\n{1}\n".format("*** CSV ***",dfcsvfile))

d = "/var/www/html/data/employee.json"
dfjsonfile = pd.read_json(d)
print("{0}\n{1}\n".format("*** JSON ***",dfjsonfile))

import xml.etree.cElementTree as et
dfxmlfile = pd.DataFrame(columns=('Name','Bday'))
d = "/var/www/html/data/employee.xml"
parsedXML = et.parse(d)
for node in parsedXML.getroot():
    name = node.find('Name').text
    bday = node.find('Bday').text
    dfxmlfile = dfxmlfile.append({'Name' : name , 'Bday' : bday},ignore_index=True)
print("{0}\n{1}\n".format("*** XML ***",dfxmlfile))

paragraphs.title: Data From SQL
paragraphs.text:
import mysql.connector

cnx = mysql.connector.connect(user='admin', password='EmoryCE1', host='de.emoryce.com', database='de')

cursor = cnx.cursor()
cursor.execute("SELECT Name, Bday FROM employee")

dfsql = pd.DataFrame(columns=('Name','Bday'))
 
for (Name, Bday) in cursor:
    dfsql = dfsql.append({'Name' : Name , 'Bday' : Bday},ignore_index=True)
#    print("Name: {0} Bday: {1}".format(Name, Bday))

cursor.close()
cnx.close()

print(dfsql)
